snippet: Emirates Team New Zealand tore the tarp in the center of its catamaran and lost two men overboard before holding on to beat the Italian team Luna Rossa.
abstract: Emirates Team New Zealand tears tarp in center of its catamaran and loses two men overboard before holding on to beat Italian team Luna Rossa in opener to Louis Vuitton Cup; winner of best-of-13 Vuitton Cup advances to America’s Cup match against Oracle Team USA, which has been accused of cheating by both teams.
lead_paragraph: Emirates Team New Zealand tore the tarp in the center of its catamaran and lost two men overboard before holding on to beat the Italian team Luna Rossa.

headline.main: Team New Zealand Takes Chaotic Opener
headline.print_headline: Team New Zealand Takes Chaotic Opener
